RHaP.cropping_functions module¶

RHaP.cropping_functions.cropImage(image, crop_bottom, crop_top, crop_left, crop_right)[source]¶

Crop an image

Parameters

  • image (jpg or png) – The image that is to be cropped

  • crop_top, crop_left, crop (crop_bottom,) – How many pixels to crop in each of these directions

Returns

image – The image that has been cropped

Return type

array

RHaP.cropping_functions.cropping_tube(image, crop_param, size_param, dilation_param)[source]¶

Cropping tubes of an image

Parameters

  • image (jpg, png) – The original tubed image that needs to be cropped

  • crop_param (int) – Threshold for removing the dark edges i.e., tube ends in the image

  • size_param (int) – Make sure features below this size (i.e. hydrides) are not included in cropping

  • dilation_param (int) – Dilate the cropped boundary by a number of pixels

Returns

  • cropped image – The final cropped image

  • cropped threshold – True/False array highlighting the cropped and not cropped regions
